creator: aespinoza@poderjudicial.gov.bo
text:
Using RedHat 7.2. I tried two ways. The first one:

steps to compile:

*** 1 ***

./configure --prefix=/usr/local/apache2 --enable-so

It works fine.

*** 2 ***

make

the error is here it says:

Making all in passwd
make[3]: Entering directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr/passwd'
make[4]: Entering directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr/passwd'
/bin/sh /usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=compile 
gcc -g -O2 -pthread   -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -DLINUX=2 -D_REENTRANT -
D_XOPEN_SOURCE=500 -D_BSD_SOURCE -D_SVID_SOURCE   -I../include -
I../include/arch/unix  -c apr_md5.c && touch apr_md5.lo
In file included from /usr/include/unistd.h:500,
                 from apr_md5.c:112:
/usr/include/bits/confname.h:71: syntax error before `{'
make[4]: *** [apr_md5.lo] Error 1
make[4]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr/passwd'
make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[3]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr/passwd'
make[2]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr'
make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib'
make: *** [all-recursive] Error 1

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Second One:

*** 1 ***

./configure --prefix=/usr/local/apache2

works fine.

*** 2 ***

the error in protocol.c is:

In file included from /usr/include/unistd.h:500,
                 from apr_md5.c:112:
/usr/include/bits/confname.h:71: syntax error before `{'
make[4]: *** [apr_md5.lo] Error 1
make[4]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr/passwd'
make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[3]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr/passwd'
make[2]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr'
make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib'
make: *** [all-recursive] Error 1

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Second One:

*** 1 ***

./configure --prefix=/usr/local/apache2

works fine.

*** 2 ***

the error in protocol.c is:

In file included from /usr/include/unistd.h:500,
                 from apr_md5.c:112:
/usr/include/bits/confname.h:71: syntax error before `{'
make[4]: *** [apr_md5.lo] Error 1
make[4]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr/passwd'
make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[3]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr/passwd'
make[2]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr'
make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib'
make: *** [all-recursive] Error 1

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Second One:

*** 1 ***

./configure --prefix=/usr/local/apache2

works fine.

*** 2 ***

the error in protocol.c is:

In file included from /usr/include/unistd.h:500,
                 from protocol.c:97:
/usr/include/bits/confname.h:71: syntax error before `{'
make[4]: *** [apr_md5.lo] Error 1
make[4]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr/passwd'
make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[3]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr/passwd'
make[2]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib/apr'
make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0.35/srclib'
make: *** [all-recursive] Error 1

The error is an OS-provided header file, which indicates a problem with your
OS installation or with your compiler.  Sorry, but there is nothing we can do
to help you with this.
creator: slive@apache.org
